item.title: Flyover covered, 21st December
item.description:
As usual the flyover is covered in graffiti. It needs a proper management programme putting in place. As it is it is treated like a graffiti wall by the local youth, which just encourages more.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): New Kent Road, Walworth, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet
